name: Microwave
description:
Family has two children - one in Sec 2 and one in infantcare. Mom is currently sole breadwinner and caregiver for both children; spouse is incarcerated until Sep 2025. Mom is working part-time at a fast food chain and usually has no time to cook meals as she has to rush from her workplace to fetch her younger son from infantcare after her shift ends around 5pm. 

Family would benefit from a microwave so that they can reheat food bought from outside or leftovers readily.

name: Oven
description: Client is a mother of 5, children aged 1, 4,8,10, and 14. Together with her husband, the family stays in a 2-room rental flat. Husband used to be the sole income earner, with client taking charge of the household  chores and caregiving of children. However, he suffered a stroke towards the end of last year and had to stop work. Client has since started her own home baking business, whilst managing the multiple caregiving responsibilities at home, which includes both caring for children and husband. Client's oven broke down recently and she hopes to acquire a new oven to help keep her business running to supplement the household income. Oven will go straight to client to help her generate income to meet the basic needs at home.

contact.org: Touch Community Services - Touch Family Enablement
contact.name: Neo Xiao Hui
